thread.section_title: Cash4Books.net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cash4Books.net | www.cash4books.net | 2 of 81
thread.title: Sydney

author: Sydney
title: Sydney
text: I sent in perfectly good books and they did not accept them, however they wouldn't send them back without charging me...for my books! This was stated no where before I sent them and only became news after they had my books. Not only did I try to email them I tried calling them multiple times and got no response from anyone! Worst customer service ever!So now they just have my very expensive and very good quality books. DO NOT SEND YOUR BOOKS HERE THEY WILL STEAL THEM
